forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. NNE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
